Goal Representation: ['1. Locate the remote control.', '2. Use the remote control to turn on the TV.']

def is_remote_present(remote_control:item):
    # Function to check if there is a remote control present
    symbol present=exists remote: item : is_remote_control(remote)
    return present

behavior approach_remote(remote_control:item):
    body:
        achieve close_char(char, remote_control)
        # Approach the remote control if it is found

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if is_remote_present(remote_control):
            # If a remote control is present, approach it
            bind remote_control: item where:
                is_remote_control(remote_control)
            approach_remote(remote_control)

        else:
            # If no remote control present, inspect unvisited items to find it
            foreach remote_control: item:
                if is_remote_control(remote_control) and not visited(remote_control):
                    observe(remote_control, "Check is this the remote control")

    symbol accessible=exists nearby_item: item : grabbable(remote_control) and close(remote_control,
 nearby_item)

behavior check_remote_control(remote_control:item):

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists remote_control: item : is_remote_control(remote_control) and is_remote_control_acc
essible(remote_control):
            bind remote_control: item where:
                is_remote_control(remote_control) and is_remote_control_accessible(remote_control)
            achieve close_char(char, remote_control)
        else:
            foreach remote_control: item:
                if is_remote_control(remote_control) and not visited(remote_control):
                    check_remote_control(remote_control)

behavior use_remote_control_to_turn_on_tv(remote_control:item, television:item):
    body:
        achieve plugged(television)
        # The TV should be plugged in to ensure power supply

        achieve is_off(television)
        # Initially, confirm that the TV is turned off

        achieve_once inhand(remote_control)
        # Temporarily hold the remote control to operate it

        turn_on_tv_with_remote_control(remote_control, television)
        # Use the learned behavior to turn on the TV using the remote

        achieve is_on(television)
        # Ensure that the TV is turned on after using the remote
